title: Copy initial step components from FO-03
description:
Copy the initial onboarding step components from FO-03.

Files to copy to app/fo-04/components/:
- step-welcome.tsx (Steps 0-2)
- step-familiarity.tsx (Step 3)
- step-topics.tsx (Step 4)
- heart-animation.tsx

Update imports to use fo-04 paths.
These components are identical to FO-03 for Steps 0-4.
acceptance_criteria: All 4 component files exist in app/fo-04/components/ with correct imports
closed_reason: Copied step-welcome, step-familiarity, step-topics, heart-animation to fo-04 with updated imports
